getDWDContent gets the content (filenames etc.) of a DWD ftp repository

getDWDContent.Rd

getDWDContent gets the content (filenames etc.) of a DWD ftp repository

Usage

getDWDContent(repository, quiet = T, LoadMetaData = F)

Arguments

repository

ftp address of repository with DWD weather data

quiet

Give echo or not

Value

List with 1 data frame and one array of ZIPIDs stationlist = data frame with the columns: "Stations_id" "von_datum" "bis_datum" "Stationshoehe" "geoBreite" "geoLaenge" "Stationsname" "Bundesland" filelist: all filenames of the not zipped files repository ziplist: names of the zip files in the repository zipID: 5 digit ZipIDs
